story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_0300_10: Paulo said he’s gonna become the “last evil.”
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_0400_10:
And that he has no other choice... It’s almost like
he’s stuck in that mentality...
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_0500_10: His goal is to destroy all evil, right?
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_0600_10:
Doesn’t that mean that after he accomplishes
his goal...
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_0700_10:
then he’ll be the villain, and he’ll want someone
take out him as well?
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_0900_10:
He shouldn’t have to shoulder that burden or try to
change the world all by himself!
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1000_10:
No matter how deep the sorrow, it won’t hurt so
much if we all share it!
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1200_10:
I don’t want anyone else to experience the kind of
sadness Professor Sycamore and Lysandre felt.
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1300_10:
As for me... I still wanna be rivals with you guys,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Paulo should be able to get stronger even without
going down the path of evil.
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1500_10:
He’s just a little awkward about these things.
Kinda like Silver.
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1700_10:
Just because someone makes a mistake doesn’t
mean there’s no going back!
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_1800_10:
Even N and Hugh were able to reach an
understanding!
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_2000_10: Yeah. We’ll have to show him it’s not too late!
story_final_01_03000/2401_1201_2200_10:
I think if anyone can wake Paulo from this
nightmare, it’s you and Tina!
